original_title: 石和温泉で見つけたお嬢さん 温泉なんだからタオル一枚で挑戦は当たり前！！ ビッショリ濡れたタオルから透ける乳首を一般客にジロジロ見られて超ビンダチ！！ 温泉で人生は波乱万丈だ！ゲーム （DOD）
overview: A young lady found in Isawa Onsen aims to get the prize money, and has a shameful first experience in a lewd game! ! Inside the hot springs, squares filled with things written that would be embarrassing for a girl to say. Take off your clothes, cover yourself with a towel, roll the dice, and get started! ! Even if the whole body is wet and the nipples and mako are exposed to the general public, you can't do it! !
title: Beautiful Onsen Girl Wrapped Up in Only A Towel - Of Course It's an Onsen! As the Towel Gets Wet Her Hard Nipples Start to Show Driving the Regular Customers Crazy! Wild Lives at the Onsen! Game
